attr.title: Armor Stride
attr.desc: Sir Stepsalot is trapped in the Cursed Forest! Armed with his sword and bomb pouch, he must fight monsters, dodge traps, and seek treasure to sell. But he can't linger -- something dark is chasing him through the woods.
attr.inst: Purchase from itch.io (https://louiechapm.itch.io/void-call), and download the 'Armor Stride Stand-Alone' version. Then, extract, and copy the game files to the armorstride/assets folder
attr.inst_md: Purchase from [itch.io](https://louiechapm.itch.io/void-call), and download the **Armor Stride Stand-Alone** version. Then, extract, and copy the game files to the `armorstride/assets` folder
